text: Harry Jay Knowles (born December 11, 1971) is an American movie critic and writer. He is known for his website called Ain't It Cool News.Weinraub, Bernard (November 16, 2007). "The Two Hollywoods; Harry Knowles Is Always Listening". The New York Times Knowles was born in Austin, Texas. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ain't It Cool News * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American movie critics Category:American Internet celebrities Category:Writers from Austin, Texas
title: Harry Knowles
